# delegate

**Instance Property**

The receiver’s delegate or `nil` if it doesn’t have a delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: AnyObject? { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAlertViewDelegate] for the methods this delegate should implement.

## Setting properties

- **alertViewStyle**: The kind of alert displayed to the user.
- **title**: The string that appears in the receiver’s title bar.
- **message**: Descriptive text that provides more details than the title.
- **isVisible**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is displayed.
